Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the movies *Nagin (1976)* and *Koi... Mil Gaya*?
Options:
A. a) Suniel Shetty plays a role in *Koi... Mil Gaya*.
B. b) Raj Babbar plays a police officer in *Nagin (1976)*.
C. c) Both movies feature characters with similar traits.
D. d) All of the above
